questions.question: What is the value of maxNumberSearchResultsPerElementByUtil if it is INSIDE of Repeatable Group Element
Do “Group Elements” have tab “parameters” in their settings
answer: No. (Only the “Page” group-search-element has it. Others do not have a “parameters” tab)
Yes. (all the elements must have it)

questions.question: What types of Search Elements exist
questions.answer: Groups; Text mining; Image mining; Predefined templates

questions.question: Name all TEXT MINING elements
questions.answer: Term; Tier Term, Alphabet, Label, RegEx, Paragraph, Read all text, Date

questions.question: What is the value of maxNumberOfInvalidItemsInInstances if an element is inside of a Repeatable Group search element
If we want to extract checkbox button values or radio button values, which search element from Groups will we use
Which “Image Mining” search element is the only one that has the “Parameters” tab
Name all GROUPS elements
questions.answer: Simple, Repeatable, Cascade, Check box, Key value pair

questions.question: Can we use “designer” for searching for handwritten signatures
Name all IMAGE MINING elements
questions.answer: Line, Rectangle, Signature, Bar code

questions.question: Name all TABLE TEMPLATES elements
questions.answer: Table Template, US Address, Label-value

questions.question: Which graph type is used from “antd“ library for the “Extraction execution workflow”
List all the tabs that we  can have in the Settings of some “search element”
questions.answer: Parameters, Details, Relations, Filters

questions.question: 3 out of 4 tabs in the Settings of a “search element” have the same fields. Which ones? (these counts for Image mining and for text mining)
questions.answer: Details, Relations, Filters

questions.question: List all “Text Mining” elements that have the same fields in the “Parameters tab”
questions.answer: Date, Tier, Tier Term, Label, RegEx

questions.question: Group elements have only two tabs in settings. Which ones
questions.answer: Details. Relations

questions.question: I want to allow only specific characters “#$%” to be found and I want to disallow “^&” characters. Which search element will I use?
Why is “simple group element” used
questions.answer: Simple group search element definition is used to group multiple simple elements such as terms, labels, date times, regex values, and rectangle elements.

questions.question: Why is “repeatable group element”
questions.answer: Repeatable group search element definition is used to extract groups of repeatable items (structured such as tables and unstructured also).

questions.question: What does the “date” search element do?
questions.answer: The “Date” time search element definition is used to extract date time fields from a source file (document).

questions.question: What does the “Read all text” search element do?
questions.answer: Read any text search element definition is designed to take all text from a specified search area, regardless of how far are some parts of the text. Element provides controls for specifying the maximum allowed multi-lines, words count, etc.

questions.question: If we have a table in the document which “Group element would we use to process it
Why is the “Term” search element used
answer: To find a static text/term from a page.

questions.question: Where can we see the “Maintainability index” and “Performance index”
questions.answer: Inside of an LDED summary

questions.question: Which search element would we use If we want to find “static text”
Which search element will we use if we want to search for a whole paragraph on some page
Which types of Algorithms exist
questions.answer: Classification and Extraction algorithms

questions.question: How many classification algorithms are allowed
questions.answer: Endless. But to run “batch-extraction” we need to have only ONE CDED or otherwise, it will throw errors.

questions.question: Where can you export LDED
questions.answer: There are 3 main columns in the “Designer”, in the middle column we can see all the Algorithms (CDEDs and LDEDs) listed. When one of the algorithms is expanded we can see the list of “actions”: Try-extraction, Export LDED, Save… Field Structure, Debug, Delete, Close

questions.question: Can we use “designer” for searching horizontal or vertical lines
answer: Yes. We can use the LINE search element
No. It will cause an error

questions.question: Can we use “designer” for searching for barcodes
What is the value for cancellationTimeoutInSecs if it is INSIDE of any Group Search Element
Where can you Delete or Edit current LDED
questions.answer: There are 3 main columns in the “Designer”, in the middle column we can see all the Algorithms (CDEDs and LDEDs) listed. When one of the algorithms is expanded we can see the list of “actions”: Try-extraction, Export LDED, Save… Field Structure, Debug, Delete, Close So to delete an LDED you need to open it, expand it, go to the actions, and select “FIELD STRUCTURE”. That will open a modal where we have 2 tabs: “Field Structure” and “Extraction algorithms”. In the “Extraction algorithms,” we can see all the LDEDs and CDEDs listed, they are from the currently open Document-Definition. Each one will have a “Delete” button in the bottom right corner.

questions.question: What is the value for cancellationTimeoutInSecs if it is OUTSIDE of any Group Search Element
Where can you extract LDED
questions.answer: There are 3 main columns in the “Designer”, in the middle column we can see all the Algorithms (CDEDs and LDEDs) listed. When one of the algorithms is expanded we can see the list of “actions”: Try-extraction, Export LDED, Save… Field Structure, Debug, Delete, Close

questions.question: What is the value of maxNumberSearchResultsPerElementByUtil if it is OUTSIDE of Repeatable Group Element
Where can we find the LDED summary
questions.answer: When we open any CDED or LDED in the middle of the designer page in the header there is an icon next to the “expand” button.

questions.question: In which 3 columns is the Designer UI split
questions.answer: “Batch structure”, “Document Definition”, “Page Viewer”

questions.question: Do we list definitions one-by-one inside the middle column of Designer, or do we list them All at once?
questions.answer: All from once. In the header, we can see the number of Definitions `${definitions.length} Definitions

questions.question: In the Designer, we have main 3 columns: “Batch structure”, “Document Definition”, and “Page Viewer”. Which tabs do we have in “Document Definitions
questions.answer: Extraction Definitions, Results, Designer Audit

questions.question: Where can you find “Extraction Definitions”
questions.answer: Inside of Document Definitions section in the middle column of designer

questions.question: Where can we find “Create new LDED”
questions.answer: in the HEADER of the middle column in the Designer (an icon on the right side)

questions.question: What can we find in Designer Audit
questions.answer: “Classification Report” and “Timing report”

questions.question: What is “OCR”
Where is the “Classification report” on the designer page
questions.answer: in the middle column of the Designer in the “Designer Audit” tab

questions.question: Where is the “Timing report” on the designer page
questions.answer: in the middle column of the Designer in the “Designer Audit” tab

questions.question: Where can we find “Create new document definition”
questions.answer: in the HEADER of the middle column in the Designer (an icon on the right side)

questions.question: What can we do In the Designer, In the “Field Structure” popup modal in the “Field Structure” tab
questions.answer: Have no idea, ask Ivan
